product_name: Wilderness Press A Fork in the Trail: Mouthwatering Meals and Tempting Treats for the Backcountry
long_description: . Author: Laurie Ann March. Softcover; 298 pages; color photographs. Wilderness Press; copyright 2008. Includes detailed descriptions and instructions for recipes that are ideal for extended backpacking or camping trips. Recipes include breakfasts, lunch, dinner, desserts, snacks, drinks, special delights for children, treats for dogs and and a section on more elaborate dishes. Extensive glossary introduces special ingredients.
short_description: A Fork in the Trail features easy-to-follow instructions that illustrate how a little at-home preparation makes the difference between a backcountry diet of gorp and one that's gourmet.
